title: "Hey can we trade roles? I don't want to support"

replies.body: no see you don't understand, i know support is the least popular role and the fact that i got autofilled into it automatically tells me that nobody else on this team wants to play it, but **_I_** am the **_main character of League of Legends_** so i deserve to get my role, which happens to be mid. but i'll take top too :^)
It's really bamboozling when your primary pick is support and you get another role. Just. Whoaaaaaaaaaa.
Ikr?  I usually just sit there in stunned silence for a couple seconds like "what...what do I do now?"
one time i had support primary and adc secondary, got autofilled as top
Wow that's pretty insane.  Especially when you consider that getting support gives you autofill protection.

If I manage to escape the stupor and ask to trade typically the supports willing to trade. However, if they're also a support main well...

https://media.giphy.com/media/gTCHpdPbSwjPq/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Blazingflares,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ndg2v0sm,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-07-20T12:26:31.042+0000)
>
> It's really bamboozling when your primary pick is support and you get another role. Just. Whoaaaaaaaaaa.

Its apparently possible for that to happen while someone else gets autofilled into sup lol

How in the HELL did the game give you support, and not me?!

WHAT IS THIS ATROCITY?!

#SupportMain4Lyfe
bard is fun plus u get to ult the person who took your role
Good thing i practiced my sup {{champion:28}} lol

I main support, though.

Sometimes I queue for other roles, but if someone asks to trade, I usually will. No biggie.
Oh you picked a tank role I see, Fish!  *gets looks*  Look up Slaking...you'll understand.
